akn:content.akn:p:
§ 2141. Supervision of Botanic Garden The supervision of the Capitol police shall extend over the Botanical Garden. (R.S. § 1826.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was classified to section 215 of former Title 40, prior to the enactment of Title 40, Public Buildings, Property, and Works, by Pub. L. 107–217, § 1, Aug. 21, 2002, 116 Stat. 1062. R.S. § 1826 derived from Res. July 15, 1870, No. 131, 16 Stat. 391.
